short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the RS website! Toggle virtual levels on RS3 and OSRS hiscores, and add wiki links to GE market search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
More easily compare stats against friends! Enable the RS3 or OSRS hiscore virtual levels toggles to make all skills show virtual levels (up to 120) on any hiscore page instead of being capped at 99.

Add wiki links to quickly and easily get info on items found in the GE market search. Add a social news column to the homepage.
